document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Laura Menninger Jeff Pagliuca 
Christian Everdell 'BOBBI C STERNHEIM' 
Subject: US v. Maxwell, 20 CR 330 (AJN) - Reply in support of Government's Motions in Limine 
Date: Thu, 28 Oct 2021 03:49:27 +0000 
Attachments: Govt_Reply_Brief [unredacted].pdf; Govt_Reply_Brief [proposed_redactions].pdf 
Good evening, 
Attached please find the Government's reply in support of its motions in limine in the above-captioned case. Pursuant to 
the Court's order, the Government will file a redacted version on the public docket on Friday, October 29. 
Respectfully submitted, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00023121
